channel.title: minimal productivity on Markus Bloom
channel.description: Recent content in minimal productivity on Markus Bloom

item.title: Doing vs thinking
item.description: Doing > thinking # I mastered the art of founding companies in my head. I have ideas, come up with features, see the potential for expansions, and envision a future in which the company has thousands of employees, all before working a single minute. This process can go on for days, and some unrealised ideas spook around my head for years. While I have an above-average backlog of ideas in my optimised Obsidian setup that is part of my perfect productivity environment, I fail to show any output.
